meanings.definition: Moving or acting with great haste
meanings.sent1: She ran hurriedly to catch the bus.
meanings.sent2: He always completes his tasks hurriedly.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel hurriedly gathered nuts for winter.
meanings.sent4: Time hurriedly slipped away as they enjoyed the party.
meanings.sent5: The wind hurriedly swept the leaves across the yard.

meanings.sent1: They ate their lunch hurriedly before the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The students hurriedly finished their exams.
meanings.sent3: The chef hurriedly prepared the meal for the hungry guests.
meanings.sent4: The news spread hurriedly throughout the small town.
meanings.sent5: The rain hurriedly soaked through their clothes during the storm.

meanings.sent1: The hurried decision led to unexpected consequences.
meanings.sent2: She made a hurried attempt to fix the broken vase.
meanings.sent3: The hurried painting looked messy but had a unique charm.
meanings.sent4: His hurried speech left the audience confused.
meanings.sent5: The hurried pace of the race left everyone breathless.
